thread.title: Giannis Antetokounmpo leads fan voting for this year's NBA All-Star game
thread.title_full: Giannis Antetokounmpo leads fan voting for this year's NBA All-Star game

author: Newsroom
title: Giannis Antetokounmpo leads fan voting for this year's NBA All-Star game
text:
Giannis Antetokounmpo leads fan voting for this year’s NBA All-Star game
Newsroom January 16, 2025 16.01.2025 • 21:51
Giannis Antetokounmpo currently holds the top spot in fan voting for players participating in this year’s NBA All-Star Game.
According to the latest results released by NBA Communications, the international superstar and Milwaukee Bucks star has garnered 3.4 million votes, maintaining his position as the leader in the Eastern Conference. Similarly, in the Western Conference, Nikola Jokić of the Denver Nuggets leads with 2.9 million votes.
This year’s NBA All-Star Game, the 74th edition of the event, will take place on February 16 at the Chase Center in San Francisco.
Giannis Antetokounmpo and Nikola Jokić lead their respective conferences in the third fan returns of #NBAAllStar Voting presented by AT&T.
Fans account for 50% of the vote to decide All-Star starters. Players and a media panel account for 25% each. pic.twitter.com/FBGGd00GB2
— NBA Communications (@NBAPR) January 16, 2025
Sports Diaspora Giannis Antetokounmpo
